bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, April 30, 1879

div1.p: Reed continues his trip back to Fort Apache, Arizona. He has not heard from her lately.

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie Lawrence Reed, April 30, 1879
div1.p:
We reached
San Jose at 3.30 P.M- We are
slowly pegging along &
putting the miles behind
us one by one. 130 of them
have betaken themselves
to the rear - 380 still remain.
Expected to find a postal here
from you, but was disap-
-pointed- I forgot whether
I told you to address me
here- am anxiously ex-
pecting your letter from Bal-
timore- will get it at
Santa Fe, I hope- am very
well - weather clear, but
windy. Love & kisses for you
& baby-
